speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0249/2007 ), by Mr Vidal-Quadras, on behalf of the Committee on Industry, Research and Energy, on prospects for the internal gas and electricity market ( 2007/2089(INI) .
original: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0249/2007 ), by Mr Vidal-Quadras, on behalf of the Committee on Industry, Research and Energy, on prospects for the internal gas and electricity market ( 2007/2089(INI) .
